roles.note: This actually conflates two senses, the "buy" sense and the "sell" sense. In the "buy" sense you offer cash for some commodity; in the "sell" sense you offer some commodity and hope to get some cash for it. Thus the "direct object" will vary between Arg1 and Arg2. (from offer.01-v)

example.name: ditransitive
example.text: A solicitous Christian chauffeur offers the hero God's phone number.

example.name: PP benefactive
example.text: A solicitous Christian chauffeur offers God's phone number to the hero.

example.name: contrasting with above
